char- embeddings.from sentence: This analysis confirms the effectiveness of char- embeddings , as its addition increased the F1 and EM scores , by 2.7 % and 3.1 % , respectively .

standard attention mechanism.from sentence: Most importantly , when the convolutional attention was replaced by the standard attention mechanism proposed in , the performance dropped by 2.4 % in F1 and 2.5 % in EM .

capable of producing.from sentence: Moreover , the tests also indicate that the reduction layer is capable of producing useful word representations when compressing the embeddings .

standard feedforward layer.from sentence: Indeed , when we replaced that layer by a standard feedforward layer with the same reduction ratio , there was a drop of 2.1 % and 2.5 % in the F1 and EM scores , respectively .
